author: Tim Daniels
title: Matthew Stafford, Wife Kelly Help Detroit Community amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Detroit Lions  quarterback  Matthew Stafford  and his wife, Kelly Stafford, have pledged $220,000 to help several local programs aimed at aiding the Detroit area during the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Duane Burleson/Associated Press
Detroit Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford and his wife, Kelly Stafford, have pledged $220,000 to help several local programs aimed at aiding the Detroit area during the coronavirus pandemic.
